import React from "react"; const AboutSection = () => { return (

About Us

We are basically a bunch of sports fans & lovers who eventually ended up making their careers in the visual and sports broadcast industry. With a cumulative experience of more than 30 years, we have passion, experience & industry know.

Design on a Dime was incorporated as a private limit company registered under the Companies Act of India, 2010.

Our aim is simple, organic and was naturally birthed owing to us being both sports & entertainment afficionados as well as passionate end consumers. To provide cost effective & end to end solutions for all the graphics needs of our clients on a global scale by using the most up to date technology and in house innovations available. Our previous organizations have seen us as project leads and we have delivered solutions for premier sporting events like the Indian Premier League, Big Bash League, Caribbean Premier League just to name a few.

We have also worked closely with the television broadcast houses like Sony, Star, Ten Sports, and Zee.

We helped them in delivering various graphics packages for through their channels.

We have also helped them in creating & intellectual properties like the famous Pro Kabaddi League.

We conceptualized the entire show and our aim was to engage the viewers with cutting edge video graphics and new sports data to basically revolutionize the sport for all. We are not only limited to Visual Graphics Broadcasting but we also cater to the world of Virtual Reality.

We also specialize in delivering the news room solutions virtually, in terms of Design and/or with

); }; export default AboutSection;
